  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_80960</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_80960</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Maintenir un satellite dans son orbite autour de la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Keeping a satellite in its orbit around the Earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Halten eines Satelliten in seiner Bahn um die 
Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mantendo um satélite em sua órbita em torno da 
terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mantenendo un satellite nella relativa orbita 
intorno alla terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κράτηση ενός δορυφόρου στην τροχιά του γύρω από τη 
γη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mantener un satélite su órbita alrededor de la 
tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme illustre qu'un satellite reste dans  son orbite elliptique autour de la terre due à la force centripète de la pesanteur que la Terre exerce sur lui.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates that a satellite stays in its elliptical orbit around the Earth due to the inward force of gravity exerted by the Earth on it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">La terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">orbite elliptique</string>
            <string language="en">elliptical orbit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">force</string>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pesanteur</string>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">satellites</string>
            <string language="en">Satellites</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, daß ein 
Satellit in seiner elliptischen Bahn um die Masse wegen der inneren 
Kraft von Schwerkraft angewendet durch die Masse auf ihm bleibt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra que um satélite permanece 
em sua órbita elíptica em torno da terra  devido à força interna 
da gravidade exercida pela terra nele.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra che un satellite rimane 
nella relativa orbita ellittica intorno alla terra dovuto la forza 
interna di gravità impiegata dalla terra su esso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα διευκρινίζει ότι ένας δορυφόρος 
μένει στην ελλειπτική τροχιά του γύρω από τη γη λόγω στην 
εσωτερική δύναμη της βαρύτητας που ασκείται από τη γη σε το.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra que un satélite permanece 
en su órbita elíptica alrededor de la tierra  debido a la fuerza 
interna de la gravedad ejercida por la tierra en él.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elliptische Bahn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Satelliten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">órbita elíptica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Força</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gravidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Satélites</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">orbita ellittica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gravità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Satelliti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελλειπτική τροχιά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βαρύτητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δορυφόροι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">órbita elíptica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gravedad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Satélites</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
